hero.title: Export Quality Vehicles Worldwide
hero.subtitle: SS Holdings connects you with premium vehicles for export to any destination. Browse our inventory and find your perfect car today.

featuredCars.title: Featured Vehicles
featuredCars.subtitle: Explore our selection of premium vehicles available for export worldwide. Each car is carefully selected to ensure the highest quality and value.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose SS Holdings
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We provide comprehensive export services with a focus on quality, reliability, and customer satisfaction. Here's what sets us apart.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Every vehicle undergoes rigorous inspection to ensure it meets our high quality standards before export.

globalShipping.title: Global Shipping
globalShipping.description: We handle all logistics to deliver your vehicle safely to virtually any destination worldwide.

expertSupport.title: Expert Support
expertSupport.description: Our experienced team provides personalized assistance throughout the entire export process.

cta.title: Ready to Export Your Dream Car?
cta.subtitle: Contact us today to discuss your specific requirements and discover our current inventory of premium vehicles available for export.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our car export services.

exportTime.question: How long does the export process take?
exportTime.answer: The export process timeline varies depending on your location and specific requirements. Typically, it takes 2-4 weeks from purchase to shipping, and an additional 1-8 weeks for shipping, depending on the destination.

exportCountries.question: Which countries do you export to?
exportCountries.answer: We export vehicles to most countries worldwide. Our extensive shipping network allows us to deliver to virtually any destination, including Asia, Africa, Europe, the Middle East, and the Americas.

customs.question: Do you handle customs clearance?
customs.answer: Yes, we handle export customs clearance. Import customs clearance at the destination can also be arranged in many countries through our network of partners, though additional fees may apply.
